descript.supplinf: Non-spatial table [[OBJECT]] is part of [[DB NAME]], a composite dataset that conforms to [[GEMS]]. [[FEATURE DATASET]]. This file was partially automated by the use of [[SCRIPT]].

attracc.attraccr: Confidence that a feature exists and confidence that a feature is correctly identified are described in per-feature attributes ExistenceConfidence and IdentityConfidence.

horizpa.horizpar: Estimated accuracy of horizontal location is given on a per-feature basis by attribute LocationConfidenceMeters. Values are expected to be correct within a factor of 2. A LocationConfidenceMeters value of -9 or -9999 indicates that no value has been assigned.

enttyp.enttypd: Non-spatial table that captures content of the Description of Map Units (or equivalent List of Map Units and associated pamphlet text) included in a traditional paper geologic map. Has an internal hierarchy expressed by attribute HierarchyKey
enttyp.enttypds: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Age of map unit as shown in Description of Map Units. Examples of values are "late Holocene", "Pliocene and Miocene", "Lower Cretaceous".
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Text description (e.g., "random small red dashes") provided as a convenience for users who must recreate symbolization.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: RGB color space values that specify the suggested color (e.g., "255, 255, 255", "124, 005, 255") of area-fill for symbolizing MapUnit. Each color value is an integer between 0 and 255. Ideally, values are zero-padded to a length of 3 digits and values are separated by commas.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Free-format text description of map unit. Commonly structured according to one or more accepted traditions, e.g., lithology, thickness, color, weathering and outcrop characteristics, distinguishing features, genesis, age constraints.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/
GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attrdomv.udom: Arbitrary string. Values should be unique within this database.

attr.attrdef: Source of map-unit description; foreign key to table Datasources.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Name of map unit including identification of containing higher rank unit(s), e.g., "Shnabkaib Member of Moenkopi Formation".
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Categorization of map unit based on lithologic and genetic character, term selected from NGMDB standard term list defined in Appendix A of GeMS documentation, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

codesetd.codesets: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Describes the confidence with which the GeoMaterial term describing the map unit was chosen. Values must be defined in Glossary table.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: String that records hierarchical structure. Has form nn-nn-nn, nnn-nnn, or similar. Numeric, left-padded with zeros, delimited with any non-alphanumeric character such as dots, dashes, slashes, etc. Each HierarchyKey fragment of each row MUST be the same length to allow text-based sorting of table entries.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Text, with markup tags if desired, to be used for labeling the feature.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Short plain-text identifier of the map unit. Foreign key to DescriptionOfMapUnits table.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Name of map unit, as shown in boldface in traditional DMU, e.g., "Shnabkaib Member". Identifies unit within its hierarchical context.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Token that identifies formatting of paragraph(s) within traditional Description of Map Units that correspond to this table entry.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

attr.attrdef: Identifier or code for the symbol to be used to portray the feature. Definition here should include the name of the style file, symbol set, gallery, etc. that contains the symbol.
attr.attrdefs: GeMS (Geologic Map Schema) - a standard format for the digital publication of geologic maps, available at http://ngmdb.usgs.gov/Info/standards/GeMS/

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata
